snippet: The console went on sale Nov. 29 in the United States, Western Europe and Latin America, around the same time that its rival Microsoft released its Xbox One.
lead_paragraph: The console went on sale Nov. 29 in the United States, Western Europe and Latin America, around the same time that its rival Microsoft released its Xbox One.

headline.main: Sales of Sony’s PlayStation 4 Climb Past 10 Million
headline.print_headline: Sales Of Playstation 4 Climb Past 10 Million
